Package org.spongepowered.api.event.world.chunk

Interface ChunkEvent.WorldScoped

All Superinterfaces:
ChunkEvent, Event
All Known Subinterfaces:
ChunkEvent.Generated, ChunkEvent.Load, ChunkEvent.Save, ChunkEvent.Save.Post, ChunkEvent.Save.Pre, ChunkEvent.Unload
Enclosing interface:
ChunkEvent
public static interface ChunkEvent.WorldScoped extends ChunkEvent
Represents an event that has knowledge about the ServerWorld that is being operated upon.

  • Method Details

    • worldKey

      ResourceKey worldKey()
      Gets the ResourceKey of the ChunkEvent.WorldScoped that the WorldChunk resides in.

      Be careful when retrieving the ServerWorld within this event as some events may not fire on the main thread and such world access is not thread safe.

      Returns:
      The world's ResourceKey
